Package org.spotify.db.dao

Interface Repository<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the entity that this repository manages (e.g., MusicCollection, Performer, Song)
All Known Implementing Classes:
MusicCollectionDAO, PerformerDAO, RadioDAO, SongDAO
public interface Repository<T>
Generic repository interface for CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations.

This interface defines the basic operations that can be performed on entities of type T. It is intended to be implemented by DAO (Data Access Object) classes to interact with the database. By providing these common CRUD methods, it abstracts the data access logic for various entity types, such as MusicCollection, Performer, and Song.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Method Details

    • save

      void save(T obj)
      Saves a new entity to the database.

      This method persists the given object into the database. The object will be inserted as a new record.

      Parameters:
      obj - the entity to be saved

    • update

      void update(T obj)
      Updates an existing entity in the database.

      This method modifies an existing record in the database with the provided object's updated information.

      Parameters:
      obj - the entity to be updated

    • delete

      void delete(T obj)
      Deletes an entity from the database.

      This method removes the provided object from the database.

      Parameters:
      obj - the entity to be deleted

    • findAll

      List<T> findAll()
      Retrieves all entities of the given type from the database.

      This method fetches all records of type T from the database and returns them as a list.

      Returns:
      a list of all entities of type T

    • findById

      T findById(Long id)
      Finds an entity by its ID.

      This method retrieves a record of type T from the database based on the provided ID and returns it. If no record is found, it returns null.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the entity to be found
      Returns:
      the entity with the specified ID, or null if not found
